scripts.deploy: npm run deploy:play && npm run deploy:submit && npm run deploy:guess && npm run deploy:reveal
scripts.deploy:play: gcloud functions deploy guess_the_dj__play --entry-point play --runtime nodejs16 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated
scripts.deploy:submit: gcloud functions deploy guess_the_dj__submit --entry-point submit --runtime nodejs16 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated
scripts.deploy:guess: gcloud functions deploy guess_the_dj__guess --entry-point guess --runtime nodejs16 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated
scripts.deploy:reveal: gcloud functions deploy guess_the_dj__reveal --entry-point reveal --runtime nodejs16 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated
